news.title: Reeves backs off from proposals to raise income tax rates in Budget
news.summary: The chancellor had been widely expected to increase income tax rates, which would have broken a manifesto promise.

news.title: Doctor strike inflicting pain and misery on patients, says health secretary
news.summary: Health Secretary Wes Streeing says patients could be harmed by the 5-day strike.

news.title: BBC apologises to Trump over Panorama edit but refuses to pay compensation
news.summary: Lawyers for the US president have threatened to sue the corporation for $1bn (Â£759m).

news.title: Russian drone slams into block of flats in deadly wave of strikes across Kyiv
news.summary: Six areas of the capital are hit, and a further attack on a market in the south kills two others.

news.title: New photo of King on his Sandringham estate released for 77th birthday
news.summary: The picture shows the king at his Sandringham estate in Norfolk, holding a shepherd's crook.

news.title: Fly-tippers bury field in 'shocking' mountain of waste
news.summary: The enormous pile of rubbish is called an "environmental catastrophe unfolding in plain sight".

news.title: Amber warnings issued as Storm Claudia brings heavy rain and flooding to UK
news.summary: Storm Claudia will bring heavy and persistent rain to parts of the UK on Friday. Amber warnings have been issued and there is a risk of flooding and disruption as Simon King explains.

news.title: US group pulls out of deal to buy Daily Telegraph
news.summary: US investment group RedBird Capital is pulling out of a deal to buy the UK newspaper, the BBC understands.

news.title: Man suspected of being fake admiral at Remembrance event investigated
news.summary: Members of the Royal Naval Association in Llandudno spotted a man wearing an unusual uniform.

news.title: Why I'm sharing the reality of life in a sick kids' unit
news.summary: Kirsty Grandison is using social media to share her experience of caring for her severely brain damaged son.
